description: Apple announced a new, completely redesigned iPad Pro and we just got to spend a few minutes trying it out. The iPad Pro no longer has a home button; thats been replaced with Face ID. The transition to Face ID allowed Apple to make the iPads side bezels slimmer than ever before, and the result might be the truest embodiment of a tablet yet. This thing is just a giant, beautiful screen.
